content:
Andean Spirit - The feeling of this yarn is luxuriously soft, super lightweight, and classy.

Don't just knit. Make fashion. Our yarns are made to keep up with the design trends around the world. When knitting with Babypima, everything looks outstanding.

We found the perfect blend between two of the best fibers in the world, Baby Alpaca and Pima Cotton. The moment you touch it you will find out why this yarn is just an experience from out of this world.

Soft for your skin, gentle with the environment.

This yarn comes with our air-jet technology, which allows us to give you a nice and soft baby alpaca yarn with a lot less weight. Faster to knit, thanks to the volume it produces.

All of our Yarns are bigger than normal. One yarn is enough to make a small project (E.G., beanies, gloves, or mini snood)

BENEFITS:

Lightweight. Forget about heavy garments.
2 of the most luxurious fibers in the world. Quality was rigorously selected
Soft as a cloud.
Warm and cozy
 YARN SPECS

Blend 60% Baby Alpaca 40% Peruvian Pima Cotton
Craft Knitting, Crochet
Ball Weight 3.52oz, 100gr
Yarn Weight Worsted
Yarn Lenght 220Yds (201mt)
Needles US 8 (5mm) - Or Bigger
Care Hand Wash in cold water / Dry flat
 

What can I do with this yarn?

This yarn is perfect for knitting a Cardigan, a Scarf, or even a blanket, anything you like!

We give you the finest yarn, you just have to turn it into the perfect garment.
